value: Very small fragments. a) rag paper, a very small portion of which contains any pigment. The design appears to be printed in deep rust, white and a salmon-color on a lighter salmon-color ground. The rust-color forms a "Y"-shaped motif. The verso contains fine yellow line markings along one edge; b) This appears to be a ribbon wrapped rod. It is printed in red on deep red flock.
